message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your perspective, Bob. While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to negotiate. How about we settle at $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000?
